message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this incredible product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I understand its value, but I believe I can't proceed at $1,500,000. My counteroffer is $1,200,000.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,400,000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I respect your valuation, I am unable to proceed at $1,400,000. My counteroffer remains at $1,200,000.
